name: MEMessageSigner
desc: An object that contains details about the person who signed a message.

items.name: init(emailAddresses: [MEEmailAddress], signatureLabel: String, context: Data?)
items.desc: Creates a new message signer object that contains the email addresses of the signers, a label, and context data.

items.name: var emailAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses associated with the signature.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A string that the messageâ€™s headers use to display the message signer.

items.name: var context: Data
items.desc: Data related to the message signature, such as the signing certificate.
